sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { GlobalState } from '../../../../GlobalState' function BtnRender({ product, deleteProduct }) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const addCart = state.userAPI.addCart c return (
{ isAdmin ? <> deleteProduct(product._id, product.images.public_id)}> Delete Edit : <> Add to Cart Details }
) } export default BtnRender
